title: Implement transactional service pattern
description:
Implement the Validate→Perform→Verify→Archive→Respond pattern that prevents data corruption when downstream dependencies fail.

**The Pattern**:
1. VALIDATE - Check all inputs and preconditions
2. PERFORM - Execute the operation(s)
3. VERIFY - Confirm the operation succeeded
4. ARCHIVE/UPDATE - Persist the verified state
5. RESPOND - Return success

**Key Principles**:
- Validate Early: Catch all invalid inputs before any state changes
- Perform Once: Execute the actual operation
- Verify Always: Never trust that an operation succeeded without verification
- Archive Verified: Only persist state that has been verified
- Respond Last: Return response only after full success

**Files**: internal/app/executor.go
**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Pattern documented with comprehensive examples
- Interface for each step (Validator, Performer, Verifier, Archiver)
- Error types for each failure mode
- Logging at each step for audit trail
- Unit tests demonstrating the pattern

4. Add to response headers

title: Implement pagination pattern
description:
Implement cursor-based pagination for list endpoints.

**Pagination Request**: Cursor string, Limit int (1-100, default 20)
**Pagination Response**: Items []T, NextCursor string, HasMore bool

**Cursor Encoding**:
- Cursors are opaque to clients (base64 encoded)
- Contain sort field value + ID for stable ordering
- Signed/encrypted to prevent tampering

**Files**: internal/adapters/http/dto/pagination.go
**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Generic PaginatedResponse[T] defined
- Cursor encoding/decoding implemented
- Default and max limits enforced
- Pattern documented with examples
- Works with any sortable field

title: Implement error handling
description:
Implement domain-to-HTTP error mapping with standard error envelope.

**Error mapping**:
- domain.ErrNotFound → 404 Not Found
- domain.ErrConflict → 409 Conflict
- domain.ErrValidation → 400 Bad Request
- domain.ErrForbidden → 403 Forbidden
- domain.ErrUnavailable → 503 Service Unavailable
- Unknown errors → 500 Internal Server Error (log full error, return generic message)

**Files**: internal/adapters/http/dto/errors.go, internal/adapters/http/errors.go
**Acceptance Criteria**:
- Standard error envelope defined
- All domain errors mapped
- Unknown errors don't leak details
- Trace ID included in responses
